name: Gool FM
description:
Gool FM waa idaacaddii ugu horreysay ee Soomaaliyeed ee gaar u ah arrimaha isboortiga.
	Show more

name: Radio Risaala
description: Radio Risaala broadcast online 24 hours a day, seven days a week. Radio Risaala brings you the friendly voices of the community plus a wide range of music, including classical, contemporary, jazz and country . As a community station, Thay also have programs for ethnic communities Somalia, Aboriginal programs, religious programs, sport, local news and interviews etc.

name: Radio Daljir
description: Radio Daljir broadcasts its programmes decorate its playlists for a socially and culturally diverse audience. In addition to the broadcast of a variety of information and entertainment programmes, Radio Daljir broadcasts diverse local productions. Their productions and information based programs contains such as current affairs, culinary, cultural, entertainment and sports fields. They are working as a bridge between listeners and music.
